page.title: 12Wednesday - A Favourite Day
page.content: { {7.00 }I wake up,get dressed, have breakfast, then go to school. {9.00 }Whistle goes. After assembly and R.E. we go on the coach to the swimming pool.(I have done my Stage1) {11.00}Back at school we watch a T.V. programme and then we do some follow up work about it. {12.00}We eat our packed lunches then I play football with my friends. {1.00}Back into school. We do Art and Craft and English in the afternoon. {3.00}We go home. We usually have our tea early on Wednesdays. {6.30}I go to Cubs, my school friends are my "sixer" and "seconder". {8.00}I go home and then to bed.
